mapper.select: SELECT mi.`id` id,mi.`itemsname`,ir.count,ir.`priceType`,mi.`normalPrice` qprice, ir.`fprice` hprice,ir.count*ir.fprice price,ac.`artisanClassName` bzname,s.name fwman,ac.id bzid FROM item_repair ir LEFT JOIN ${tab} r ON ir.wjid=r.number LEFT JOIN maintenanceitems mi ON ir.`itemid`=mi.`id` LEFT JOIN artisanclass ac ON ir.`teamid`=ac.`id` LEFT JOIN staff s ON s.`staffNo` = r.`staffno` WHERE ir.wjid ='${number}'

SELECT getg.`id`,getg.`type`,cl.`name` clname,getg.`goodid` commodityno,com.`name`,com.`unit`,getg.`priceType`,getg.`count`, getg.`discountsPrice` qprice,getg.`discountsPrice`,getg.count*getg.`discountsPrice` price,s.`name` sname,getg.`cause`,com.brand,com.cartype FROM getgood getg,commodity com,`${tab}` r,staff s,carinfo car,`client` cl WHERE getg.`wjid`='${number}' AND com.`commodityNo` = getg.`goodid` AND r.`number`=getg.`wjid` AND s.`staffNo` = r.`staffno` AND car.`id`=r.`carinfoId` AND car.clientid=cl.`number` ORDER BY getg.`type`

select *from (SELECT repair.status,repair.type,client.name clientname,carinfo.carNumber,client.phone,repair.number,'维修' AS tname,repair.orderTime, repair.overworkdate,repair.nowworkDate,repair.stockDater,repair.price,staff.name,repair.getman,clienttype.clienttype FROM REPAIR JOIN `carinfo` ON carinfo.id=repair.carinfoId JOIN `staff` ON staff.staffNo=repair.staffno JOIN `client` ON client.number=carinfo.clientid join clientType on clienttype.id=client.typeid UNION ALL SELECT rescue.status,rescue.type,client.name clientname,carinfo.carNumber,client.phone,rescue.number,'救援' AS tname,rescue.orderTime, rescue.nowdate,rescue.overtime,rescue.stockDater,rescue.price,staff.name,rescue.getman,clienttype.clienttype FROM rescue JOIN `carinfo` ON carinfo.id=rescue.carinfoId JOIN `staff` ON staff.staffNo=rescue.staffno JOIN `client` ON client.number=carinfo.clientid join clientType on clienttype.id=client.typeid ) item WHERE ${type} like '%${content}%' OR item.clientname LIKE '%${cpc}%' OR item.carNumber LIKE '%${cpc}%' OR item.phone LIKE '%${cpc}%'

SELECT repair.`number`,repair.`orderTime`,repair.type,repair.`nowworkDate`,client.`name`,carinfo.`carNumber`,client.`phone`,repair.`stockDater`,repair.`price` FROM`repair`
LEFT JOIN `carinfo` ON carinfo.`id`=repair.`carinfoId` LEFT JOIN `client` ON client.`number`=carinfo.`clientid` WHERE ${type} like '%${content}%'

SELECT carinfo.`carNumber`,client.`name`, repair.`number`,repair.`orderTime`,repair.type,repair.`nowworkDate`,repair.`stockDater`,item.id,item.itemsName,ir.priceType ,(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,repair.`orderTime`,repair.`stockDater`)) workhour,ir.fprice,artisanclass.`artisanClassName`,repair.`faultreasult` FROM`repair` LEFT JOIN `item_repair` ir ON ir.wjid=repair.`number` LEFT JOIN `maintenanceitems` item ON item.id=ir.itemid LEFT JOIN`itemtype` TYPE ON type.id=item.typeid LEFT JOIN `carinfo` ON carinfo.`id`=repair.`carinfoId` LEFT JOIN `artisanclass` ON artisanclass.`id`=ir.teamid LEFT JOIN CLIENT ON client.`number`=carinfo.`clientid` WHERE ${type} like '%${content}%'

SELECT carinfo.`carNumber`,client.`name`, repair.`number`,repair.`orderTime`,repair.`type`,repair.`overworkdate`, repair.`stockDater`,getgood.`type` lltype,getgood.`goodid` gw,com.name llname, com.unit dw,getgood.`priceType`,getgood.`count`,com.normalprice qprice,getgood.`discountsPrice` fprice ,getgood.`item` itemname FROM `repair` LEFT JOIN `getgood` ON repair.`number`=getgood.`wjid` LEFT JOIN `commodity` com ON com.commodityno=getgood.`goodid` LEFT JOIN`carinfo` ON carinfo.`id`=repair.`carinfoId` LEFT JOIN`client` ON client.number=carinfo.`clientid`
WHERE ${type} like '%${content}%'
mapper.sql: number, carinfoId, staffno, oil, type, worktime, getman, overworkdate, nowworkDate, setter, company, befor, price, remark, state, fault, faultreasult, status, orderTime, stockDater, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from repair
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into repair (number, carinfoId, staffno, oil, type, worktime, getman, overworkdate, nowworkDate, setter, company, befor, price, remark, state, fault, faultreasult, status, orderTime, stockDater, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive) values (#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overworkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nowworkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{setter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{befor,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faultreasult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stockdater,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{otherone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{othertwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherfour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherfive,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update repair
number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carinfoId = #{record.carinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staffno = #{record.staffno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oil = #{record.oil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
worktime = #{record.worktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

fault = #{record.fault,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderTime = #{record.ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stockDater = #{record.stockdater,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
otherone = #{record.otherone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
othertwo = #{record.othertwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
otherthree = #{record.otherthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
otherfour = #{record.otherfour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

carinfoId = #{carinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staffno = #{staffno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oil = #{oil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

worktime = #{worktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

overworkdate = #{overworkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nowworkDate = #{nowworkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
